Class Bishop

java.lang.Object
ChessGame.Figure.ChessPieces.Bishop.Bishop
All Implemented Interfaces:
IntBishop, IntFigure
public class Bishop extends Object implements IntFigure, IntBishop
Represents a Bishop piece in a chess game.
